title: GIMP Photo Editor 2025 on CD Disc | Premium Professional Image Editing Software Compatible with Windows 11 10 8.1 8 7 Vista XP PC 32 & 64-Bit, Mac & Linux | Lifetime Licence & No Monthly Subscription
description: is a powerful ever evolving image editing software. Over two decades in the making, this is a polished, professional and highly capable piece of software, that will enable you to create your digital masterpiece or simply help edit your photos. With its plethora of tools and features, it’s suitable for both professional and amateur users alike.
- Image retouching and editing, free-form drawing, resizing, cropping, photo montages, converting between different image formats and many other more specialized tasks.
- Support for plug-ins and scripts, extending the software's already huge functionality even further.
– Create, open, edit and save many different file types including .jpg, .gif, .png, .pdf, .hdr, .tif, .bmp and many more. It is also fully compatible with Adobe Photoshop .PSD files.
- Free for-life updates leave you free to create without the worry of the need for expensive new versions.
with Windows PC 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP 32/64-Bit, and Mac (10.4.11 Tiger to latest macOS)
